movies.title: Cottage Country
movies.plot: Todd (Labine) wants everything to be just perfect at the family cottage where he plans to propose to Cammie (Akerman). But things go awry with the arrival of Todd's slacker brother Salinger (Petronijevic) and his free-spirited girlfriend Masha (Punch). When Todd accidentally dispatches his irksome sibling with an axe, Cammie is determined not to let murder stand in the way of their happiness.
movies.simplePlot: When a man accidentally kills his brother with an ax, his fiancée is determined not to let even murder stand in the way of their happiness.

biography.bio: Malin was born in Stockholm, Sweden and raised in Toronto, Canada. Her mother, Pia (Sundström), is a model and aerobics instructor, and her father, Magnus Åkerman, is an insurance broker. They moved to Toronto when she was age 2. At age 5, she began appearing in TV commercials. Her parents divorced when she was 6 and her father returned to Sweden. At age 17, she won the Canadian title of Ford Supermodel. This enabled her to spend 3 years as a catwalk model in Europe. She decided to become a child psychologist and enrolled in York University but she was offered a guest role in Invasion planète Terre (1997) so she turned her attention back to acting. She moved to Los Angeles in 2001 and won roles in both TV and film. Her breakthrough role came when she was cast as Silk Spectre II in Watchmen (2009).
biography.name: Malin Akerman

biography.bio: Tyler Labine was born on April 29, 1978 in Brampton, Ontario, Canada. He is an actor and producer, known for Tucker & Dale fightent le mal (2010), Rise of the Planet of the Apes (2011) and Monsters University (2013). He has been married to Carrie Ruscheinsky since June 2, 2007. They have one child.
biography.name: Tyler Labine

biography.bio: Lucy Punch grew up in London and was a member of the National Youth Theatre in her late teens before going to University College London to read History. While she was there she auditioned for TV roles and eventually dropped out to concentrate on acting. She learned a lot, she says, from working on the short-lived TV series Let Them Eat Cake (1999) with Jennifer Saunders and Dawn French and although she has played many serious roles on TV and in film since, it's her comic skills that have shone. After several years of steady TV and film work at home, she moved to Los Angeles in the mid-2000s and soon found work there on another short-lived comedy show, The Class (2006) and has stayed in the US ever since, appearing on TV and in movies to increasing acclaim.
biography.name: Lucy Punch

biography.bio: Daniel (Dan) Petronijevic was born March 28, 1981 he is a Canadian actor, who performed the role of Thad Guerwitcz on ESPN's football series Playmakers, and he also was the voice actor of Geoff in Total Drama Island, Total Drama Action, and Total Drama World Tour. In 2006 he had a role of Bull in American Pie Presents The Naked Mile, and he had the same role in 2007 in American Pie Presents Beta House.
biography.name: Dan Petronijevic

biography.bio: Benjamin Ayres was born on January 19, 1977 in Kamloops, British Columbia, Canada as Benjamin James Ayres. He is an actor and writer, known for Saving Hope (2012), Dan for Mayor (2010) and jPod (2008).
biography.name: Benjamin Ayres

biography.bio: Kenneth Welsh was born on March 30, 1942 in Edmonton, Alberta, Canada. He is an actor, known for The Day After Tomorrow (2004), Aviator (2004) and The Exorcism of Emily Rose (2005).
biography.name: Kenneth Welsh

biography.bio: Nancy Beatty is an actress, known for Lars and the Real Girl (2007), Life with Billy (1993) and The Shipping News (2001).
biography.name: Nancy Beatty

biography.bio: The multi-talented, multi-award winning Canadian actress Sabrina Grdevich has been active in the entertainment business since 1991 on screen and stage. Her distinguished theatre career led to roles in television, independent features and eventually mainstream film. She had a Dora award-winning role in the DuMaurier Theatre production of The Old Man's Band and understudied 22 people at Canada's Stratford Festival, where she appeared in the Shakespeare plays Hamlet (As Ophelia) and Measure for Measure as well as the Checkov play Uncle Vanya. She has resided in both Los Angeles and New York plying her trade there but has since returned to Toronto. Is of Italian-Slovanian descent Was the first English Voice Artist for cartoon character Sailor Pluto.
biography.name: Sabrina Grdevich

biography.bio: Jim Annan is an actor and director, known for Repo Men (2010), Unlucky (2011) and Talk to Me (2007).
biography.name: Jim Annan

biography.bio: Jonathan Crombie was born on Wednesday, October 12th, 1966, in Toronto, Ontario, Canada. He was the baby of the family (he had two older sisters). His parents are David and Shirley Ann. Jonathan never intended on becoming an actor but he was spotted in a high school production of "The Wizard of Oz" by casting director Diane Polley. She also suggested him for casting him a character role in both A Judgment in Stone (1986), Le bonheur au bout du chemin (1985) & its sequel, Anne of Avonlea (1987). It was originally titled "Anne of Avonlea" when it was first prerecorded, on VHS tape. Needless to say, he had char roles, but it is the role of Gilbert Blythe that won him recognition and is the role for which to many, he is best remembered and loved. Jonathan graduated from the University of Toronto's Victoria College in 1995. His numerous performances at the prestigious Stratford Festival Theatre are a given. His performance in the role of Valentine Coverly at the Canadian Stage Company's Arcadia earned Crumbled a 1997 Dora Mavor Moore Award nomination for Outstanding Performance, a well deserved award. Jonathan Crombie's life ended. His life unexpectedly on Wednesday, April 15th, 2015, from a brain hemorrhage. His life-time was 17,717 days, equaling 2,531 weeks evenly.
biography.name: Jonathan Crombie

biography.bio: Earl Pastko is an actor, known for De beaux lendemains (1997), Land of the Dead - Le territoire des morts (2005) and Battlefield Earth (2000).
biography.name: Earl Pastko

biography.bio: Bill Turnbull is an actor, known for The Vow (2012), American Pie Presents: The Naked Mile (2006) and Todd and the Book of Pure Evil (2010).
biography.name: Bill Turnbull

biography.bio: Jason C. Paul is an actor, known for Cottage Country (2013), Eight Mississippis (2015) and Tomb (2014).
biography.name: Jason C. Paul

biography.bio: It looks like we don't have any Biography for Chuck Erlichman yet.
biography.name: Chuck Erlichman
